name: listen v.0.0.3
description: this is a game I've been working on for some days. its in very early development, its in pre alpha I think, I have no clue how game versions work, anyways. there is only one level and it isn't even done, but download it if you want. basically its a 2d geometry dash ish game, where you scroll along the screen and you have to avoid some black squares coming towards you, with the ability to move using the up and down arrows. (pls tell me how I can improve the game page) (made for 16:9 screens)
